author: Lindsay Selvitelle
title: YC’s Director of Events on Hosting a Virtual Event
description: It’s likely that the responsibility of hosting virtual events no longer falls solely on the webinar expert in your organization. It’s now a necessity for all teams to host their own virtual events to stay connected with customers, employees and followers. The…
